sentences.sContent: Alex wrinkled up her nose at the smell.
sentences.sCn: 闻到那股味道，亚历克丝皱起了鼻子。

sentences.sContent: Carter wrinkled his forehead in concentration.
sentences.sCn: 卡特全神贯注，眉头紧锁。

sentences.sContent: His brow wrinkled when he saw us.
sentences.sCn: 他一看见我们就皱起了眉头。

trans.tranOther: if you wrinkle a part of your face, or if it wrinkles, small lines appear on it
wrinkles are lines on your face and skin that you get when you are old
